bill.title: "Conditional Post-Conviction Release Act"; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The "conditional Post-conviction Release Act"; To Provide Certain Definitions; To Provide That When An Individual Is Released Early From Incarceration Such Inmate May Be Required To Post An Early Release Bond That Is Backed By A Surety; To Authorize The Releasing Authority To Set Certain Conditions For Release As Part Of The Bond; To Provide Certain Terms For The Early Release Bond; To Require That A Surety Pay Certain Breach Penalties If An Individual Breaches Certain Conditions; To Authorize The Surety To Arrest Such Individual If He Or She Breaches The Conditions Of Release; To Amend Sections 47-7-5 And 47-7-33, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.
